name: david taga
text:
Touring acoss the states from California to Indiapolis with a drum and bugle corp with a Winnebago.  It needed an oil change and I found Alabama RV Shop close by. Went there and I thought I was in the wrong place, but the address is correct.
Its a family owned business in which Glen, the owner, is very knowledgeable on RV's.
I would recommend for basic RV repairs.

name: Meagan
text: Do not take your camper here. They are dishonest people who do not make it right when they mess something up. Our camper was hit and damaged in the inside. The owner refused to make it right, telling us he did not want our business (after he was paid to fix our air conditioner). If you want your camper taken care of, DO NOT take it here!!

name: fat mama's lunchbox
text: It's a great place to get work done and the help is so great

name: Reginald Cook
text: Its a great place to get work done and the ppl are great

name: ty smith
text: Never been

name: David Crauswell
text: A great place

name: Elizabeth Fauss
text: We highly recommend this campground! It’s a wonderful very safe place to stop and camp especially if you are doing just one night! It’s quiet and very easy to get to from I-20. It is exactly 1 mile (doesn’t even feel like it’s even that far). It’s behind the storage company. If you don’t turn right on the road after the storage place you will miss it. It’s a tucked away treasure. The spaces are huge, easy to get in and out of and perfectly flat! There is a beautiful tree line and plenty of areas for your pups. Bruce the owner is amazing! He has made the process so simple and easy to book. He is very friendly and down to earth. I cannot praise this place enough!

name: Kathy McCorkle
text: Hidden Gem!  Right off I 20.  Not a resort, it’s well kept, large gravel sites for one night or long term, easy hookups, grass and not one or two, but three, large fenced in, grass dog runs!  Well kept, owner was very helpful, we will definitely back on next cross country trip.  Had a 40ft Class A towing and did not have to unhook.  Wish they could all be this big, neat, easy in and out!  See you next time!

resp.text: We we be here ready for you! So glad you enjoyed your stay!

name: L Spo
text: Traveling back home from Tennessee to Texas.  We found this little gem looking for an overnight stop.  It is exactly as it describes. If you are traveling and need a clean,safe place this is it.  Water, sewer,electric (30/50 amp), WiFi, two dog runs and one mile off interstate 20 .  Easy off/on.  Easy in/out.  Large well packed base slots with many pull thru.  Bruce is a great host.  We will be back for sure next trip thru.

resp.text: We'd love to have you back! Safe travels!

name: Julia Slaughter
text: Clean, safe park. Owner was very accommodating and a pleasure to speak with on the phone. He was very very very very helpful. Facilities were perfect and it was quiet. Not too crowded. We got in at 11ish, and it was no problem! Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad you had a great experience! We love to hear this and feel free to come back any time you're in the area!

name: Donna Pickett
text: This place is a great place to stay! Nice people and clean/quiet area despite being close to businesses. They also have a safe area to go to in case of bad weather which made me feel safe   I’m a travel nurse being alone most of the time and I felt secure here. Not far off interstate and close to college and anything you might need. Thanks Bama!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We strive to provide the best experience for our patrons.

name: Mark Bosch
text: If you’re looking for a peaceful, well kept park, this is a the ticket! Multiple dog park areas, quiet and away from the main road, and the owner seems to care about every customer. If you’re looking for an overnight stay, football game stay, or extended stay, you can’t go wrong here.

name: Judy Herring
text: We rented a large pull-thru capable of handling a 75ft rig for a night while passing thru. We had adequate room for turning and maneuvering a large rig. Level, gravel site with 50 amps, water and sewer. Lots of choices for food delivery with Waitr was a plus!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Glad you found some great food while you were here too!

name: keith walter
text: Great overnight stay in a 40 ft Class A towing a Jeep with bikes. Big-rig friendly. Level easy in easy out sites.Can't be be beat for an ovefnight stay. We ard Lifetime Good Samm Members and absolutely recommdnd this Park to all RV'ers.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to leave your feedback. We are glad you had such a positive experience at Bama RV Station!

name: Keith n Marie Kosmin
text: Clean, quiet, friendly and well maintained RV park. Great location during football season, but we stayed there overnight while on our way to Texas. Owner is very friendly and helpful. Location is far enough away from the interstate that you don’t hear trucks and other loud vehicles, but it is close enough to be a convenient overnight stop. We will definitely stay here again.

resp.text: We would love to have you back! Our facility is in a great location and we love it! So glad you enjoyed it. This is what we love to hear!

name: Tristan Schade
text: Fantastic campground! Will be coming back. Great staff! Bruce is a very friendly and helpful man.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Bruce cares about all of his patrons. I am glad you had a great experience with us.

name: Kendell Snyder
text: Stayed overnight on the way home from Florida, great park! Bruce was great, got us parked quickly. Park was clean and quiet, easy on/off from the interstate. Definitely stay here again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Bruce is a great guy and we are blessed to have him as our owner.

name: Eileen Fox-Biswell
text: Very attentive owner. Very quiet location. Close to University of Alabama.

resp.text: It was a pleasure having you here with us. Come back any time!!!

name: Estefan Olivares
text:
Quiet place to park the rv. There are a lot of spots, and it was only partially filled during our visit. We were lucky to get a pull through spot at the end. Also lucky enough to be next to the two dog runs.  Bit expensive, but we had full hook ups with electricity and waste right next to the rv so we can just let the hose and wires out.

Staff was great. Even offered us some help if the storm got worse. There was a terrible storm supposed to come in, but it just rained. Still the thought that counts.

Neighbors were also friendly, which is good cause there isnt anything to do here so having a chat while walking the dog or working outside was great

name: Ryan Davis
text: Fair prices and excellent service. Bruce is a great guy.

resp.text: Thank you Ryan! We appreciate your business!

name: Carleen Hyatt
text: Clean, quiet, reasonably priced, level sites and friendly people.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our 19 acre complex makes for a relaxing location for sure. Please come stay with us any time!

name: Samantha Shaw
text:
Under no circumstances use this camp ground. The owner cut off our water as I was washing dishes and turned off our power. This was not a one time thing and it will damage your camper. We lost all the food in our freezer. He did not knock and would just
come and open the door to the camper and had to keep it locked when I was there. When my husband went to talk to him about it very calmly and ask him to not mess with our camper. The man threatened my husband and got in his personal space. He then ask us to leave after we had paid for a month, due to asking him to not mess with our camper.

The lady at the office was very nice and helpful and did everything in her power to be so kind. She is the only good thing about the campground.

resp.text: We apologize for any misunderstanding that may have occurred during your stay with us.

name: Tammy Moore
text: Stayed here for 4 months and would highly recommend! This is a great place to stay. The owner and employees are very helpful and friendly. The RV park is in a convenient location and is safe and clean. If you need a RV park in Tuscaloosa, this is the place to stay!!

resp.text: Thank you very much! We are happy we could meet your expectations. Come back any time!

name: Patty Boulos
text: clean spots and had a great time

resp.text: Thank you for staying with us! Come on back anytime you need a place to stay!

name: Mandy MW
text: Stayed here for our first trip with a 41ft camper. Online reservations were super easy, the park was well maintained and quiet, the dog parks were clean and had plenty of SHADE! Easy location to find and close to the interstate. Lots of restaurants available for delivery on the Waitr app, too! I’m guessing during football season it’s a bit more full, but we really enjoyed our few days here as a test run!

name: Melody Cook
text: My husband and I have stayed at Bama RV over the past three months. Contrary to a couple of previous reviews, Bama RV certainly does cater to long-term camping! We have a wonderful spot, and even though we have neighbors (which we like!), we have plenty of privacy. We have a dog, so we are very fond of the three different pet areas that are offered. We have full hook up and also Wi-Fi is included in the cost! Bama RV is conveniently located less than a mile from the interstate, and with a quick trip you can reach downtown and The University of Alabama area. It is also only about a 30 minute drive to Birmingham and less if you need to go to MBUSI in Vance. Last but certainly not least, you won’t find better customer service! Denise is the absolute best! From paying your bill, to asking random questions, she goes above and beyond to help in anyway possible! She even gave us a personal phone call when bad weather was approaching to make us aware of the shelter.  Even the owner, Mr. Bruce Taylor, makes the rounds occasionally to make sure everyone is happy and that all is well.  If I could give more than five stars I would!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We sure do take pride in our facility. Our owner, Bruce, makes sure everything is secure and pleasant for our patrons. Come stay with us anytime!!

name: Ed Baldwin
text: This RV park is perfect for our trip. We wanted to be close to the University of Alabama so we could attend our granddaughter soccer camp, and not have to drive 30 minutes or more to get there. We are less than 10 minutes from the campus. We have FHUs, great wifi signal, and adequate room. The only drawback is no restrooms, showers.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our location sets us apart in a lot of situations and we are so happy you could stay with us!

name: James Gest
text: Great place to stay for Alabama football season.  Owners are very friendly and helpful.

name: Steven Riley
text:
Very nice RV Park. The Lady at the front desk was as pleasant as they come. The park is gravel roads and sites. The sites are fairly large and the hookups are very convenient. Had no problem maneuvering my 42’ MH and full size pickup toad. There are train tracks at the back of the park. We never heard a horn the night we were there. I would certainly stay there again.
Steve Riley

name: Merle Baker
text: This was an easy place to get to but we were told they had pull throughs because that is what we had to have. Upon arrival we were told they do not have pull throughs. The lad on duty in the office was very nice and accommodating. She found a spot that was not being used that allowed us to pull though. We were just staying one night & did not want tonunhook our tie vehicle. So beware, if you need a pull though, don’t go here. Other than that it was fine.

name: Shawna Peterson
text: We stayed here four months. The people in the park are friendly. The staff is terrific. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything Bama RV !

name: Jennifer Gresham
text: Staff is super helpful and friendly. Very convenient to the interstate, campus, and downtown. Nice amount of space for each rig and easy to get in and out of. Resident doggo Cooper is the best!!

name: Jon DeLuca
text: Very friendly staff, gravel road and sites, very easy to move my 41' fifth wheel in and out with ease. Good place to stay long term as well as tailgate! Roll Tide

name: Robert Slade
text: Stopped for one night in our motorhome.  Had a pull thru with 50A.  Nice clean park.  Very friendly at check-in.  Will stay here again.

name: Cindy Wilson
text: 4th year we've enjoyed a  AL football season.

name: LP
text: We love Bama RV Station!  Staff is super friendly and helpful.  Great place to store your RV if you need to.

name: Debbie Daniels
text: Nice place for one night.  Clean, good price.

name: J Thompson
text: We came down for a game last season.  It was a lot of fun.  The staff is very friendly and accomodating.

name: Justin Keeton
text: Very nice spot clean  lots i wasnt staying but a friend was if i had a camper id definitely  reccomend  this spot if you need somewhere  in the Tuscaloosa  area

name: Madison R
text: We really enjoyed our stay!  It was a perfect little home away from home.

Overhyped and overpriced. While the service is good they allow no long term rentals and they cater only to football fans . If you want a long term and more affordable RV park hit up sunset or Avalon .

Don't mean to be mean but if you're an rv park you should cater to anyone that is a patron. Not everyone lives and breathes beer and football.

name: Lindon Allen
text: Close to interstate, 50 amp service, southern hospitality, large camp spots, restaurants nearby, Walmart nearby, what more could you ask for?

name: Byrd Mathis
text: Clean grounds, level pads, several dog runs. Only drawback is no restrooms. Have stayed here in the past and would stay in the future.

name: Stephanie S.
text: This was a great RV park! We stayed here for 2 months and had a great experience. The people that run the RV park are very nice and helpful. It's a great location, it's located about a mile off the interstate and not far from gas stations, grocery stores etc. They also have GREAT Wi-Fi !! Which is very hard to find when staying at a RV park. I definitely recommend this RV park if your staying in the Tuscaloosa/Cottondale area.

name: Tom Kent
text: Nothing more than a parking lot with hookups. OK place for a couple of nights.

name: Robert Nelson
text: Good place to park the RV.

name: Llama D
text: Great customer service!

name: Lisa Reid
text: Good place to stay in Tuscaloosa

name: Kymberly Selvage
text: I was only there for a second

name: B Longson
text: No bathrooms or  showers

name: Suzanne Carr
text: We purchased our first fifth wheel from recently. Joe was very helpful and kind during this entire process. Even though they are currently remodeling, the entire team was positive, friendly and welcoming!

name: velma spradlin
text:
we recently purchased a new RV from warrior with the help of the Florence dealership . we would like to thank kevin from Florence and Darrel and Jennifer also johnny  from warrior dealership .  These guys worked very hard to help us find the right one for us.
we are grateful to everyone for their help,we are looking forward to many years of fun and travel . They made sure we have everything we need and how to use it . Great Bankston team .   Many Thanks
Velma and Randy

name: Edward Mulder
text: Poor customer service. Treated me like I was a nuisance. Ended up going to Huntsville to get a camper. Worth the drive to not deal with them again.

resp.text: Hi Edward, At Bankston Motor Homes we want every customer who walks on our lot to feel like family. We are always looking for ways to improve and would love the opportunity to speak with you and hear about your experience. The direct line to call the customer satisfaction manager is 256-346-0309 or text 256-533-3100. We look forward to speaking with you soon.

name: Donielle Wicker
text: We are repeat customers of Bankston’s, we can’t say enough good about our experience with this company as a whole! From sales to service A+ !!! Big thanks to Joe G. and Kevin at their Florence location for making our 2021 Sport Trek purchase as excellent as our 2018 Bighorn purchase was! We are Loyal to businesses who treat their customers as they should be and Bankston fits the bill! Thank you again! Gone Camping! The Wicker’s

name: Garry Hayden
text: Had a great experience buying our first camper from Kevin at Bankston Motor Homes Florence AL. The whole buying process was done over the phone, including getting the financing. We drove over from Atlanta to pick up our new camper and got a thorough walk-through. We appreciate the great customer service and highly recommend them.

name: Devon Cox
text:
Wonderful experience from start to finish..
Thank you to Kevin,Joe and everyone involved in our purchase...top notch...

name: Tyron Duncan
text: Florence.. not helpful..  Not inviting. Run down facilities. Huntsville  somewhat better

resp.text: Tyron, Thank you so much for the feedback  and we wanted to let you know we are actively working on improvements at that location.

name: SandraWeav
text: My husband and I had the best experience purchasing our camper with our salesman, Kevin!! He was able to answer all of our questions and take the time to show us what we needed to know as first time owners. I highly recommend Bankston!

name: Tammy Gregory
text: Kevin was so easy to get along with and helpful. We never once felt pressured into buying. We purchased our Fifth Wheel from a large RV show in Nashville, and was able to do the final walkthrough in Florence, Alabama. There was no problem with Bankston delivering the camper to Texas, where we are working.  As well as, with bringing the trade in back from Texas. We recommend anyone to Bankston Motor Homes, they know how to treat their customers, even if there are some special request that are asked of them.

name: Brian Reeves
text: While I was there, my experience with Mr.  Jeffrey's was great.  He answered all my questions that I had.   He was very friendly and knowledgeable.  I highly recommend him any time.  I'll be back there when I get ready to trade or purchase another camper or motor home. Thanks for the great service!!!

name: Lori Windsor
text:
Excellent customer service.  Kevin and Vivian were so helpful.  The RV was spotless when we picked it up.  Everyone at Bankston treated us like family.  This was our first RV buying experience after researching RVs for a year and they are our go to company for any future needs.
Highly recommend.

name: Dan Shafer
text: I recently purchased a new Winnebago motor home from Bankston in Huntsville   Several problems were not discovered in the pre delivery inspection. When I discovered these issues I took the unit to the Florence location which is closer to my home. The staff there quickly resolved the issues. Thanks guys for helping us out.

name: Dennis Sorrell
text: We had a couple of problems with our slide that needed attention before we felt the camper was ready for its next trip.  Joe, the mechanic, was very accommodating though his schedule was full enough already.  He worked patiently to try to diagnose and make the corrections to the slide's operation.  He also answered questions concerning other possible problems with our new camper.  He was polite, knowledgeable, and experienced.  He is a great asset to the company.

name: Bryson Jeffreys
text: Kevin took time to answer any questions or concerns we might have had. Had a excellent experience in purchasing our first travel trailer and now looking forward to use our new home away from home.

name: Greg Pigg
text: We really enjoyed our experience with Bankston of Florence.  This is the second camper I have bought from them.  I have purchased both campers from Joe.  He has been great to work with us on all things and has answered lots of questions. I feel at home when I am there.  Thank you for a great buying experience. We will be back!

name: James Nipper
text: We just purchased a new camper from Kevin and the experience was amazing. Everyone was so helpful and kind. Kevin was very knowledgeable and was not the normal pushy salesman. He help us when we needed help but also let us take are time to look at different options on our own. The whole process from the time we step foot on the lot till we picked up our new camper was great. I highly recommend using Bankstons of Florence.

name: K S
text: We drove from Oklahoma to buy our new trailer.  Kevin gave us a good price and had excellent communication throughout the buying process.  When we arrived our camper was ready as promised. Well worth the drive.  I would recommend  Kevin and the Florence location.

name: Zach'ery Antennas
text:
THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!!!!! Joe Gervias at Bankston Motorhomes of Florence, Alabama took his time to come service my RV off the clock. After 45 minutes he had it fixed like the brand new unit it is.
He was very professional and super talented at his craft. After dealing with the lacking customer service at Bankston in Huntsville, Alabama, I was hesitant to stop by the Florence location. I'm sure glad that I did.
Joe was more helpful and kind to me in the 6 hours that I knew him than the last 7 months dealing with the Huntsville location. Joe should be recognized for his loyalty to Bankston Motorhomes. It's people like Joe who makes customers want to come back. Joe went out of his way to come to my brother's house and fix an issue that had nothing to do with him other than looking out for a customer of Bankston Motorhome. THANK YOU SO MUCH MR. JOE. Bankston needs several more employees like him. 10 stars for Joe Gervais!!! Joe alone changed the way I view Bsnkston Motorhome as a complete company. HIRE MORE JOE GERVAIS !!! He is one of a kind!!

name: Bradley Mansell
text: Kevin was wonderful to deal with. Bankston of Florence is not like all the big dealerships. They treated us like they care about our business, and made sure we were familiar with our unit and satisfied with it before we took it off the lot. Thanks!

name: Harvel Scales
text:
4/17/20
My name is Harvel Scales and this message is about my visit to Bankston RV this morning at the Florence location. I've never done business with Bankston but what happened today was more than just business, it was extraordinary service!
Joe Gervais, Parts & Service Dept , had never met me until this visit. I thought I needed to buy, for the second time a new thermal couple. I was totally frustrated because I couldn't get the 6 gallon water heater working for my vintage Airstream restoration project. This was after tinkering with the thing for two days and watching about four hours of YouTube video.
With out my asking, Joe volunteered to put my 47 year old water heater on his work bench for a complete check out and test. It only took a few minutes for him to discover what I had completely overlooked; a faulty propane regulator!
Selling a thermocouple would have been the quick and simple thing to do for a customer who was interrupting the work flow for an item selling for no more than a few bucks.
At Bankston today I received a courtesy that I think is rare and over the top, all for "no charge".
You can bet that my friends in the camping world will hear this story.
Thanks Joe!
Harvel Scales

name: Regena Clark
text: Kevin was extremely knowledgeable and very helpful with the purchase of our new RV. He made the whole process so easy and enjoyable. We highly recommend Bankston of Florence to anyone looking to buy a motor home. We will definitely be back!

name: Paul Boyer
text: Kevin Jeffreys and Bankston are the best...no pressure but always willing to provide or get you the information to make an informed decision. Kevin wants you to be happy with your choice and we are. Cindy and I could not be happier!

name: Joshua Jackson
text: Joe did excellent work on our airstream and got it covered under the warranty 100%. The airstream dealer charged us $300 and said we had a deductible and didn’t even fix the problem. Joe not only fixed it right but got the warranty people to cover 100%.  10/10 would come back and recommend to anyone.

name: Koby Littrell
text: Kevin Jeffreys Is an amazing fella and we are so thankful to have him take care of us!! When we decide to upgrade to a larger camper, we will definitely come see Kevin Jeffreys in Florence, AL location.

name: Clay Glover
text: Bought our travel trailer here fall of 2016. Great, friendly service. Good experience with the sale. Great help after the sale.  Found a minor issue with the RV that came from the manufacturer that way and Bankston corrected the issue without any problems. I would recommend.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback and your business!

name: June Abe
text: I just recently purchased a mobile home from this company. I was communicating via email since I am located in CA.  MR. Will Boenker who helped me a lot.  He was so attentive, patient. I was so pleased to buy from him.  He was so cordial and his service was a perfect. I strongly recommend buy from him.  "Thank you Will again"

resp.text: We are glad to hear that Will took good care of you and, we appreciate your business.

name: AMANDA WEST
text:
I recently purchased a travel trailer from this company. Kevin Jeffreys was our salesperson and i could not have asked for a better experience. He went above and beyond to help us get exactly what we wanted.Highly recommend Kevin and Bankston motor homes.  Thank you so much for everything.    God Bless

Tim & Amanda West

resp.text: Amanda, thank you for taking time to share your experience working with Kevin at our Florence location. Kevin works very hard to make sure he helps each customer find the best unit for them- we hope your enjoy your RV!

name: Laken Wilbanks
text: Kevin and the staff stayed late and made sure we got our camper today. He also went out of his way to show us the best way to get out of Florence without having to go over the tight bridges by being our personal escort. My husband and I highly recommend Kevin and the staff at Bankston RV in Florence. Thank you Bankston.

resp.text: Thank you- so glad we were able to help!!

name: Rosie Anderson
text: We purchased a 2003 camper from Kevin Jeffreys, and it was fixed up and serviced by Joe. They made us feel very welcome, and treated us extremely professionally. They are kind and pleasant people. They are knowledgeable and passionate. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to leave a positive review, Kevin & Joe work very hard to keep their customers happy!

name: Keith Crosslin
text: Previous review was submitted by mistake. I don't know how to remove it. Definitely give Bankston motor homes of Florence a 5 star rating. Had a minor issue with my microwave, it was under warranty and Joe got it resolved promptly.

name: Joey Mashburn
text: I've been to a lot of camper sites. This is not only the best customer service you'll receive, but also some of the best prices. Joe Gervais was not only an awesome guy to deal with, but very honest up front, stayed with me on the phone during the buying process by checking in with me, and if I had a problem with camper, would get in touch with me day or night. I dont do a lot of reviews, but these guys take the cake and deserve all the credit. Kevin was also very helpful and considerate getting stuff done for me when Joe was off. Will not get this anywhere else! 5 stars plus more to you guys all the way.

name: troy wilbanks
text: Awesome place. Awesome people. Great experience. The staff at Bankston RV in Florence AL made our day, thank you Kevin and everyone that made today possible.

name: Larry Mabe
text: Kevin , joe and Sarah very good  people did a  good job traded with  them 4 times in 2 years bankston  florence  .very good  people to  deal with I rated them 4 stars.

name: Chris Burton
text: If you are looking for a camper, we highly recommend you visit Bankston in Florence and work with Kevin Jeffreys. We just bought our new 2018 travel trailer from him and the experience was great! Kevin was very knowledgable, professional, and SO easy to work with. He took so much time to help us find exactly the right camper. Thanks so much Kevin! You and the Bankston family have launched us into many years to come of good times and good memories with our new camper.

name: Barbara Skipper
text: Prices are too high!!!! Especially on used motor homes. The new ones, not so bad. But they do have excellent payments on them if you can get financed

name: Rose Allison
text: For Great service and repairs on RV's and Campers, you need to check them out. Just ask for Joe. Large selection of inventory and parts. If he doesn't have what you need he sure can get it for you. Pleasant atmosphere with a very helpful staff !

resp.text: So glad that Joe was able to take care of you - we are lucky to have him on our team!

name: Angie Haddock
text: Kevin was great to work with at Bankston in Florence. We looked at everything he had on the lot and kept him late more than once. He was so patient through the whole process and never made us feel pressured or rushed. He found us what we wanted at another location and had it brought to Florence. We appreciate all his help and will definitely return if we need another upgrade! He went all out to get us exactly what we wanted. Thanks Kevin!

name: DONNA Smith
text: Best place to buy campers in the shoals area,we had great customer service, and Kevin treats you like a friend

name: Don McNease
text:
Kevin, in florence was great. Got almost what I was asking for.
I had went to camping World and they tried to steal my motor home. Bankston did me right. Tks
Don Mcnease

name: Ryan Cowley
text: We bought our travel trailer almost 10 months ago from the Florence location and we love our trailer. They have been extremely helpful and really make sure that we are happy each time we stop in for service.

name: Rickee Butterworth
text: This is the place to go if you are interested in RVs. Joe Gervais is hands down the best RV Guru, crisis support person and service support expert for new RV owners. If I could buy all of my automobiles from this place I would.

name: Paul Sobel
text: We broke down on vacation and Joe did everything he could to deal with our insurance to get out trailer fixed. He was able to squeeze us in and get us back on our way.

name: Dr. Genie Mardis
text: Bankston gave me a fabulous price and they did a great job getting my camper ready!   Kevin goes above and beyond to help his customers!!

name: Sam Williams
text: Kevin is the best! He is so helpful! They have a great selection and great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to mention Kevin's helpfulness & leave us a 5 star review- we sincerely appreciate it Samantha!

name: Stacy Franks
text: I give them a 5-star rating simply due to their professionalism that was exhibited. Thank-You Joe and Ms Smilly face. I am sorry for my misunderstanding.

resp.text: Stacy thank you for making time to leave a positive review about Joe's professionalism, that was very kind of you.

name: Angel Cuevas
text: This Place went above and beyong to help me and my family with our first RV purchase, Kevin went above and beyond to make this a super easy purchase. I am active duty military and Bankston RV of Florence, AL really takes care of us service members. I drove 2 1/2 hours to go see the RV and after the deal was complete Since I couldn’t bring it home the same day they had it transported to a Bankston dealer closer to me. Our salesman was Kevin and he always kept us updated on what was going on and the status of the paperwork, he is super respectful and knowledgeable and walked me and my family around the RV as many times as we wanted until we felt familiar with the use of the RV. Thank you Bankston Rv of Florence and a special Thank You to Kevin Jeffreys It was a pleasure doing business with you!

name: Last Chance
text:
A 2nd chance for this company was purely a waste. I brought my travel trailer to them for a possible trade. The sales man looked at it, then sent paperwork to the Nashville office to be appraised; new rules he said. Not sure how someone 2 hours away can properly appraise a trailer, but I went with it.

My trailer is listed on the internet in a thousand places, but because the "sales mgr" couldn't find it in his little book, he refused to give me a price for it. It's made by Forrest River, you know those folks... The biggest RV manufacturer in the world! The sales person said he would call me in a few minutes, because he would get it worked out. 24 hours later... Not a peep.

Aside from the blaring heavy metal music coming from the shop, the sales staff is clueless. This is my 2nd attempt to work with these folks. They lost my business the first time based on stock and pricing. There will not be a 3rd attempt. I didn't understand how they stayed in business, until I saw their $110 labor rate posted on the door....

name: JD Woodard
text: Awful. Told Joe Gervais I was interested in looking at two different campers. Waited while he text on his phone. Told him again I would like to look at the two campers, both were locked. Asked about pamphlets for the two. He went inside and came back with a pamphlet. Never offered to open either. Didn't seem interested in selling anything or doing much. Much different experience at the Huntsville store yesterday. Mr. Bankston was extremely helpful.

text: Great place if youre in the market for a camper! The salesman is top notch and will make sure you leave happy!

text: Very friendly and helpful in my search of a RV that I unfortunately was not able to purchase due to my personal financial situation. Definately the best place in florence for your rv service and accessories.

text: Very frustrated!,  Went into Florence store last Sat, 1 employee, No time to help, Went to Hunts store, No help, went back to Hunts store today to get no help, Left and thought well what about the Ardmore store, Older guy eager to help, Nobody had info to give him for the 5er I was looking at. Needless to say, I went elsewhere and will not waste my time here again.

Kevin in Florence is always glad to help with that process if you see something at another location that might interest you.  Either way, thank you for stopping by the Florence store.

text: They made me feel unnecessary.

name: Susan Arlene Moore

name: Frank Smith
text: I made a phone call to Bankston Motor Homes on Florence Blvd last week to inquire a quote to fill my propane tank. I was told 89 cents a lbs and that I should have a 20 or 30 lbs tank on my RV. I should have known better than to choose Bankston at this time since the manager on the phone acted like it was such a hassle to give me the total price for both tanks. (After all the trouble he went through for the total.) I was told it was 19.28 for a 20lbs tank and 28.32 for a 30lbs tank. Which sounds reasonable, so I didn't bother to check anywhere else in town. When I arrived today, I was greeted by a professionally dressed man asking if I needed any help. I responded I need to get my propane tank filled and to get my brakes checked. I then pulled around to get my tank filled and was told it would be next week before they could get to my brakes. No big deal I thought. so I go inside to pay and the total came to 53 and some change. I confronted him about the quote I was gave over the phone and he immediately got defensive and started to explain why I was being charged more. Since I was interested in doing more business with them with my brake problem, you would assume that he would do what was necessary to make things right. He might have took a small loss on the propane but would have simply made it up in the outstanding labor charges. When you quote someone a price you stick with that price to make your customer feel valued. I really felt like I was nothing but in the way and a hassle to them as soon as I pulled onto the lot. Bankston Motor homes is less than a mile from my house. However I will make the drive to Coldwater RV center in Muscle shoals for any future service or maintenance I need for my RV. Last time I was there before I made my RV purchase they were very helpful and took the time that was needed to explain to me the different types of water systems I Inquired about and what would better suit my needs. I would not advise ANYONE to go with Bankston Motor Homes unless you enjoy being treated like a dog.

name: Debbie Page
text: Informative, helpful. Good experience.

name: R Dayton
text: Expensive parts

name: Jonathan Frank
text: The market for off road trailers is crowded and we spent a long time evaluating the available models. We eventually chose Vintage Trailer Work's XTR Off Road model because it represented in our view the best combination of value and quality. We have owned the XTR for 6 months now and have traveled 6500 miles over some fairly challenging terrain. Overall we are very happy with the trailer's performance and comfort level. Vintage Trailer Works stands behind its products. We were particularly impressed with the responsiveness of the owner Damon who personally attended to some minor warranty issues.

name: Wesley Findley
text: Great team that will treat you like family! We found a camper that we liked but it was sold. They found another just like it and had it brought to their store for us and took great care of us!

name: CJ Branton
text:
The level of customer service found at this location is rare!  I live in Nashville TN and my search for an RV took me to Bankston Motor Homes of Warrior, Alabama!  While there is a Bankston Motor Homes in Nashville I'm thankful to have met and did business with the great folks in Warrior.  I'd make that journey 1,000 times over!  Daryl, Janet, Johnny, and Paul are the most caring, thoughtful, and thorough people I have encountered in a long time, even well after the sell!  This was my very first RV purchase and Johnny spent hours with me going over every detail of my new RV.  Johnny made recommendations on proper maintenance and intervals in order to enjoy my purchase for years to come.  Johnny and Paul made sure all systems on my RV were operational and performing optimally.

Unfortunately, when I got my RV hooked up and went to pull off the lot I had some mechanical issues on my truck.  Johnny was there to help me get turned around and back on the lot.  Being late in the evening and after closing they allowed me to set up my RV on the lot and spend the night until I could get a tow truck the next morning and find a rental truck to pull my RV home.  Johnny was very helpful during the whole ordeal.  They made sure I had the necessities I needed to get through the night.  The next morning Johnny came to me and offered to take me to get breakfast if I wanted.  Daryl personally stopped what he was doing to give me a ride to pick up my rental truck.

The entire experience at Bankston Motor Homes of Warrior was top notch!  I left feeling like family.  I left the lot to go spend the weekend camping to break in my new RV.  Johnny called me Sunday evening to check on me and make sure I made it home safe and that I didn't have any issues with my RV.

I cannot say thank you enough, nor say enough good things about these folks!  Daryl, Janet, Johnny and Paul I am truly thankful for a great experience!  Y'all are the best folks!

resp.text: CJ, thanks for the great review of your experience with our Dealership.

name: Patsy Campbell
text:
Terrible customer service.  I tried to buy from this dealership, had my financing in order, drove two hours to the dealership.  They would not take the time to complete the paper work that day, would not let me take the unit with me, told me I was required to take a four hour class.
I understand for new owners needing to take this course.  I live in a RV full time to travel for work.  I am very familiar with the maintenance and  operation of a RV.  I even accepted they wanted to keep the RV for a few days to make sure everything worked properly.  They still would not sit down and complete the paperwork with me but wanted me to give them a down payment.
FYI then person who walks into your dealership is your CUSTOMER.  You are not doing them a favor to sell them a RV. When I asked about ordering a different RV,  which was the RV I really wanted they said oh it will take 6 weeks.  in fact they had two coming within the following two weeks.  They would not even discuss with me ordering one for me.

BUT I went to BAMA RV in Dothan Al.  They had me a unit ordered the day I called them it took a week and half to have the RV ready for me!!!!

resp.text:
Here at Paradise RV Sales in Warrior, Al. we strive to satisfy each and every customer to the best of our ability. We have set in place a very strict set of Company Policies that we follow to ensure each and every customer receives a camper that has been  thru our Service Department for a complete pre delivery inspection which consist of more than 75 items, including appliance checks, plumbing checks, electrical checks, sealant checks, proper slide out operations, installing a 12 volt battery and many more in depth inspections. This takes the better part of the day but insures that the customer can leave with confidence that everything is in working order. ( the prospective buyer  does not have the option to waive the inspection, it is required by the Manufacturer and Paradise RV Sales) We also like to walk thru the camper with the customer  after the pre delivery inspection to make sure the customer is satisfied before departing with their new camper.  ( this ensures that the customer has no surprises when they get home) As with any business we ask for earnest money to engage into a transaction and start the process, taking the camper off the market for sale, doing a pre delivery inspection and ordering Loan Contracts from a Bank. If  a prospective buyer refuses to sign an agreement to purchase with a minimum deposit for earnest money then we cannot move forward with a purchase.As a Company whose goal is Customer Satisfaction we Reserve The Right Not To Sale to any Prospective Buyer that Refuse to abide by our Company Policies.
So to all of our Customers and Non Customers Paradise RV Sales would like to take this opportunity to wish  you good luck in all of your camping adventures.

name: Joshua Willis
text: Like another reviewer, I asked if I could get my camper without the customer tutorial. Daryl and Janet did not want to sell us the camper without the customer walk through. I wanted to skip the walk through. They insisted if we were going to buy, the walk through was required. I must admit that at first I was perplexed as to why they would not just sell me a camper and take my money. They really wanted us to have a good experience with their product and had our best interest in mind when they basically refused to sell without me or my wife going through the tutorial. Now I can honestly say I'm glad that we purchased from Paradise RV. My new trailer brakes that were installed the day before failed to work. I live 2 hours away from Paradise RV but luckily Johnny, in the service department, crawled under my truck. He had the problem fixed in 15 minutes. We have had our Coachmen Clipper 17bh for 3 months now and love it.

resp.text: Josh, Thanks for the kind words we really appreciate it. Our goal is to make sure everyone who buys from us leaves here feeling that we have done everything possible to make their buying experience a good one. Once again Thank You. Daryl & Janet

WOULD NEVER DEAL WITH THIS UNETHICAL PLACE.  EVER.

READ OTHER BAD REVIEW BELOW AND THIS ALSO HAPPENED TO US - WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE THAT WE HAVE EVER SEEN.  EVER.

resp.text:
I am Daryl Lowe, my wife Janet and I are the Owners here at Paradise RV Sales. We would like to take this opportunity to apologize to our real customers, it appears we are the target of Internet Spamming. In the past 30 days we have received several low ratings and slanderous remarks about our business. After a full review of our customer data base we have not been able to locate any customers named David Kerrie or Sophie Grace which David referenced in this review. If we have no records of these people evidently we have not done business with them. Therefore, the reviews are either meant for another Dealership or this could be a competitor trying to lower our Google ratings. David Kerry we would like to personally invite you to our Dealership to sit down with us, so that we may see what your concerns are. We look forward to meeting with you. We have been in business for over 20 years because we care about our customers and we want you to know we are here and available for you.
Anyone reading this review that is considering doing business with us, we ask that you take a moment to read all of our Google Reviews, check out our website www.paradiservsales.net customer testimonies page, pick up the phone and call us direct (205) 631-6006 we will more than happy to talk with you and answer any questions, if you prefer email my email address is daryl@paradiservsales.net. If you would like to come out and visit with us we will be glad to spend time with you, introduce you to our team, the Sales Dept. Jarad and Ed, the Parts Dept. Manager Barry Ugolini and our Service Manager Johnny Wideman. Janet and I are very proud of our Team and the Loyal Customer base that we have established over the past 20 years. In the Retail Business we may not be able to make everyone we come in contact with happy, but we will always be willing to sit down with anyone and try to work it out. Daryl and Janet Lowe the Proud Owners of Paradise RV Sales Warrior, Alabama.

name: Mary Coffey
text: We bought a camper from them in 2009 , there to buy some cleaning supplies to clean and treat our camper top.

resp.text: Thank you Mary, were glad your still enjoying your camper, Daryl & Janet Lowe.

name: Robert Wrinkle
text: Great people great service always very helpful

resp.text: Thank you Mr Wrinkle,  let us know when you are ready for that upgrade.

name: Randy Thomas
text: Great people to deal with

name: Francis Hughes

resp.text: Thank You Francis.

text: We looked at several campers and salesman was very patient.

resp.text: Thank you Vickie we try hard to make everyone feel welcome and pressure free here at Paradise RV Sales. Daryl and Janet Lowe.

text: Salesperson left me sitting at desk, after about 20 minutes I left

Good afternoon Tina,
My name is Daryl Lowe my wife Janet and I own Paradise RV Sales, we were very surprised to read about your experience at our Dealership and we wanted to reach out to you personally to see about amending the situation. We would like to invite you back out at anytime to sit down with us to see how we as owners can make good own a not so good experience. Our phone number is (205) 543-6770 and we would love to have the opportunity to talk with you. As a family owned business, we strive to treat people the way we want to be treated.  We look forward to hearing from you Daryl and Janet Lowe.

name: Pepper Landis
text: Kinda pricey, not very helpful

resp.text:
Pepper,
My name is Daryl, my wife Janet and I are the owners here at Paradise RV Sales. We were disappointed to see that you had a less than an excellent experience while visiting our dealership. We as owners feel customer service is a priority whether you decide to buy from us or not. The next time you plan on coming out please let us know so myself or Janet can personally assist you and hopefully your next experience will be a lot more enjoyable. Thank you for bringing this to our attention in a courtesy manner and we hope you give us the opportunity to correct the matter.
We look forward to meeting you,
Daryl & Janet

name: Charles Mccombs

name: Sophie Grace
text: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!  OWNER LIES!!!  TOOK OUR DEPOSIT AND SAID REFUNDABLE!!!  BRAND NEW RV DELIVERED HAD DAMAGES ALL OVER IT.  OWNER IS VERY ARROGANT AND HAS TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE.

resp.text: Ms. Grace, after a full review of our Customer’s Data Base which includes the Sales Department, Parts Department and Service Department we can find no record of you ever being a customer at Paradise RV Sales. We have researched all sales orders, canceled sales orders, each salesman’s potential customer log, phone call logs, email logs, fax logs, credit applications, cash deposits and credit card deposits. We simply cannot locate your name or any of your information in our files. With that being said we believe you have mistakenly reviewed the wrong Business and would respectively ask that you please review your information and consider correcting the review. After you have had the opportunity to review your information and you are still unhappy with Paradise RV Sales, I would like to personally invite you to our Dealership to sit down with me, so that I may see what your concerns are. My name is Daryl Lowe I am the owner here at Paradise RV Sales and I look forward to meeting with you.We have been in business for over 20 years because we care about our customers and I want you to know I am here and available for you.

Daryl and Janet Lowe

text: Akward

Daryl and Janet Lowe

name: Stan Bylinowski
text: We had a very good experience at Campers Inn in Madison Alabama. Everyone was very nice and accommodating without the usual high pressure sales techniques. They gave us a great deal on our new Open Range fifth wheel and top dollar for our trade.

name: Trenton
text: Very friendly staff with lots of knowledge and experience. Good people that were very willing to let us shop and ask questions at our own pace. Highly recommend that you stop and check out their inventory!

name: Deb Kaiser
text: Our experience was great with this business. People were great to work with. We were able to inspect the units we were interested in and when we needed a representative to help with questions, the person was knowledgeable and professional.

name: Kirk Monroe
text:
Greeted immediately and introduced to someone to assist and address our questions (Clay in the sales dept). Did a great job finding out our interest and what would be important for our investment. Clay went past the sales process into a customer service focus and acted as a valued consultant. Quite pleased with the experience.
Paperwork and delivery process were streamlined and went smoothly.
Would recommend to friends and family to shop here.

name: Daddyroot Daddyroot
text: Very helpful. I had improper straps and they were kind enough to help me secure my propane tank for refilling insted of just letting me wing it. Good price. Good service. What else can I say!

name: Brandon Adams
text: Everyone was very helpful. From Robert is sales, Chuck in the parts department, Aaron in the shop to Clay in Finance! You all made this a excellent experience!!! Thank you all

name: Neil Young
text: The staff is super helpful and friendly but not pushy at all which is very comforting.  The prices are definitely enticing and really good from a lot of similar places. I do recommend them for you RV needs and will definitely be going back.

name: Allison Wingfield
text:
We have had many interactions with the service dept at Madison RV. Clearly, the company's focus is NOT in the service department. We had our camper there for the better part of a YEAR, only to find... (1) We could not even see the work they did or did not do until we paid in full. (2) The work they did was SHODDY. After all that time, they left a 6"x2" hole under our shower faucet. A HOLE in the shower! They didn't even do the work on the sway bar/tow area, stating, "Uh, I didn't know what to do, so I didn't do anything." But, of course we had to pay for whatever labor cost they assigned to the undone work. (3) After getting our camper back (a few months into the year they had the camper) we discovered 2 new things had broken while at their facility (kitchen pin lights and kitchen ceiling fan) and of course we were responsible for the repair.
Were they capable to do of the repairs? Yes, I really think so. But I have to conclude that they have no motivation to complete the repairs in a timely manner, no pride in their work, poor communication between customer service and the technicians... Too many complaints and too long of a story to tell.
BOTTOM LINE: I will never return to Madison RV for work to be done on our RV.

name: Brad Mason
text: Bought a new toy hauler from Clay Phillips he is a salesman and just that nothing else once you purchase from him .He sold how great thier customer service was how great the service department was .I have yet to experience anything but disappointment. Trying to get service is like pulling hens teeth. There isn't any after the sale service. All they want is the cash after that you are forgotten. They installed a washer and dryer. I think the dryer made a week or two when it broke they said just add it to the list of everything else that's wrong. Refrigerator went out this weekend no support from Clay all I got out of service was asking what kind of a refrigerator. The list goes on and on. Sad I can't even say I got what I paid for. If you a sorry salesman and service that isn't there this is your place. B Mason

name: Tanner Wilkerson
text: Upon arrival we looked around on our own and were not rushed by salespeople as you would be on a car lot.  Eventually we asked some questions and met with Frank in sales.  We were unsure of new or used and have never owned one before.  Frank spent lots of time with us and helped walk us through the decision between new and used and gave us good practical advice which led us to look at used.  They had a good selection and we found a Camper that jumped out at us and was at a good price.  At no time did we feel pushed, pressured, or rushed and we did decide to buy that day.  The reason we bought is we liked the camper we found, Frank was very generous with the deal, the entire staff were very well informed.  I have been in sales and I was absolutely impressed with Madison RVs and the people.  They have earned my business and my referrals for life.  Upon delivery the service staff spent a generous amount of time ensuring I understood how to operate everything and Frank hung out as well to make sure we were all set.  I know that if I have any questions I can call Frank who will always be willing to help.

name: gracey bear
text: Do you consider yourself better than everyone else?  Do you enjoy being talked down to by salespeople even though they can't answer basic questions?  Do you want salespeople telling you what you want?  If so, this may be just the place for you.

name: Samuel Bennett
text: Our first time looking at RVs, it was a friendly no pressure environment.  Very helpful staff without being pressured.  Good first experience and we will definitely go back as our journey into buying an RV advances.

name: Eric Twitchell
text: There was a bit of a communication issue about ordering parts and then notification when the parts arrived.  Once everything was on site, the work was done well and fast.

name: Jackie Chris
text: Service is always great. They friendly,fast,and helpful.

name: Stephanie Horton
text: Great experience on purchasing our first new camper

name: Mary Hadden
text: Was nice looked at a camper nice people. Nice neat businesd

name: Susan McKinney
text: Parts service was extremely helpful and friendly. He helped make a bad day better.

name: Dee Walter
text:
We had an electrical problem and they found and fixed it within a few hours. We would have had a fire if they hadn't taken us in at the last minute on a Friday morning.  The service was above excellent and they kept us advised along the way on what was happening.

We'd recommend them to anyone.

name: Randy Barefoot
text: Excellent sales service. Matched the price of a competitor 3 hours away. Almost a year later, when we experienced an electrical problem, repairs were done quickly under warranty. They even replaced the door lock, which wasn't really a warranty issue, no charge.

name: Richard Werner
text: People were extremely friendly and accommodating! Didn’t feel like a number, they treated us like family!

name: chuck neel
text: This is the place to buy your next rv,  super nice people especially John in service he is amazingly knowledgeable and most helpful.

name: Rebecca Turner
text: Customers service  is very poor and work on RV has gotten worse. It has went down and prices gone up and workmanship is bad.

name: Ron B
text: Not very helpful in parts dept. This is my second visit, same experience. Completely ignored when I went in, then left totally alone in the store, then when employee reappeared, I was ignored again and he got on his cell phone instead of even acknowledging me.

name: Phil Smith
text: We spent an hour in this show room and not one staff member said hello or can I help you. We had the money to pay cash for anything we wanted. We noticed that other shoppers received help and a courteous greeting, the only difference I could see  was the color of our skin. I will be spending my green money else where.

name: Mrs C
text:
Knowledgeable, friendly staff
Highly recommend
Ask for Donny

name: Micheal Pepper
text: Great selection. Very large service center. No pressure. Great sales people.

name: Laurinda Whitt
text: I found the sales person to be kinda pushy. It would have been nice to look around at all they had to offer rather than just the first unit we came to based on what we might or might not be looking for.

name: John Foll
text: Great store and good service for those needing RV Parts. Looks like they have good selection of RV's too.

name: Terry Butler
text: Outstanding Service and Sales.  Tom Walker did an outstanding job........we had looked at the RVs they had and although they are very nice, just was not quite what we were looking for, so we told Tom what we were looking for..........about a month and a half later he texted me and said they had a used fifth wheel come in on trade that was impeccable and what he believed we were looking for.  I asked how much and it was reasonable...........but when I heard it was 10 years old I was skeptical..............Tom assured me it was in immaculate condition and said he would text pics which he did.  After seeing the pics we decided to go look at it in person, still thinking that it would not be as nice as he said...........well we were wrong it was everything thing we were looking for and more...........it looked as though it had never been used, we could not believe it.  So we said sold but what price could they do and include installing the rails for the fiver hitch.........again we were blown away with the price they gave us and told us that they always put the units in their large repair bays and go through all the diagnostics and fix everything that is wrong to include doing an orientation of the RV while in the bay and hooked up to show you exactly how everything works............a very thorough orientation.....although since we had had an rv before ours was much shorter than the four hours they allotted time for.  Again super service, friendly people, and a great salesman.  I recommend talking to Tom Walker if you are looking for an RV, he is outstanding and down to earth, could not have had a better experience!

name: Carl Esch
text: Great place for parts you might for your RV's heck if you do not have on they can fix you right up.

name: Greg Lee
text: Had a problem with the brakes on the trailer. Pulled in and they had someone come out and tested everything. Within minutes they pinpointed a bad wire between brake box and rear tires. They couldn't fix it today, but instructed me on how to. I am smart enough to do it myself, so we went on to our campground which was only 30 miles away. They said if I couldn't fix it, to just call and set up an appt so it will be done right. Would recommend them to anyone.

name: Chris Stantis
text: Be sure to check out their RV accessories, especially the cool kitchen ware!

name: Johnny Souder
text:
I live in Madison, Alabama, about two miles from Madison RV's business location.  I have been in Madison for 32 years and Before Madison RV was even built.  I own a motor coach and have tried several times to get parts and service from them.  They are EXTREMELY slow to "come through" and their prices for parts is EXTREMELY high compared to Bankston and online retailers of RV parts and expendables.  Example:  I just bought a filter from Bankston that cost $19.00 plus tax.  The same filter at Madison RV was marked up at $42.00... OUTRAGIOUS!!
I wanted to schedule an oil change and filter and was told I could get "on the calendar", but when I came up to the date it would be ONE TO TWO WEEKS TO GET ME IN after I was scheduled.  This has always been their story for the last 3 to 4 years every time I call and try to be a customer.  I was told about Southland International Trucks, just a few more miles down the road just off of I-565.  I went there and they scheduled me for ANY day I wanted this week!! They have a very professional shop and service bay compared to Madison RV supercenter.  I will no longer even TRY to do business with Madison RV.  Every time I called I always get a message that no one is at the counter or that they are at lunch.  I'm done.  When will they learn that customer SERVICE IS EVERYTHING!!

name: Ricky Miller
text: No problems good people ok prices

name: S. Mason Hamilton
text: If you are interested in service, this dealer is very unlikely to be of any use to you.  We have a motorhome for which Madison RV is the participating dealer, both for factory and extended warranty.  I called to ask for an appointment for service and was told that "if you didn't buy it here, it will be at least 3 months before we can look at it".  We bought it in a different state from a dealer in their network.  I have never had anyone who claimed to have an RV service department say anything like this to us.  If I owned this business I would be horribly embarrassed to give this kind of response to a potential customer.

name: LaDonna White
text: I'm surrounded by wonderful people they make my coming there nice they are family now.

name: Holly Lapointe Jordan
text: Prices really high, but they get done on time.  Did superb job.

name: T Q
text: Great knowledgeable staff, well stocked parts department

name: John Wood
text: We went to Maison RV looking for some advice on used vs new motorhomes.  The sales, and service staff, were excellent and answered all of our questions and concerns.  We ended up getting a used motorhome from them, new to us, because it was the right choice for us and the team at Madison RV made sure we were happy.  As a new RV owner we've had some questions and the team was very willing answer all our questions, even after we left and with us coming back.  They quickly, to our satisfaction, addressed a warranty issue.  I will continue to shop, and service our motorhome, at Madison RV.  I highly recommend Madison RV anyone looking for an RV!

name: Charles Looney
text: First time.  Associates were very helpful.

name: Stephen Armstrong
text: I just got home from Madison RV Super Center with our new Winnebago 2101 FBS travel trailer.  Clay Phillips was exceptional in helping us find the right small travel trailer at a super price.  I really stopped there as an after thought expecting high pressure sales at a huge RV dealer but nothing could be less true.  We never felt rushed and with Clay's help found the perfect 21 foot Winnebago we could pull with our SUV.  I bought a little Travel Trailer and was treated as if I were buying a 250K motorhome.  They also have a fantastic RV accessory store with everything you could need.  The icing on the cake was the service center getting our SUV set up with brake control and load leveling hitch.  Professional installation and they took a great deal of time going through the operation of all aspects of the trailer, the hitch and electric brakes.  I do not hand out kudos unless I really am impressed, they were great!

name: DeShawna Scott
text: Great service, good selection, just overpriced.

name: Bob Day
text: Friendly staff. I'm considering trading for a bigger camper, and these people are knowledgeable.

name: Mike Schmidt
text: Have been there several times. Talked with them about Service and told SERVICE is what they are known for. Have a couple warranty issues to fix. Took my trailer there as they are the only dealer anywhere close for the Brand AND RV Priority Network. Told me 2 weeks but we will move any of our customers we sold the trailer to ahead of you as they come in. I said OK. A couple sentences later, "it may be 2 or 3 months before we get to you. You should take it to where you bought it."  If you did not do ALL your business with them they do not want your business. I can guarantee they will NOT ever sell me anything.

name: Ann Hill
text: Why does it take so long to fix a 3 hour problem? Will not recommend!

name: Jim D. Brown
text: they go out of their way to do the right thing without over charging the customer.

name: Cory Weathers
text: Walked around for almost an hour and not the first salesman spoke let alone offered to help. We won't be back.

name: Suzi V
text: Friendly staff, we didn't buy anything but our friends got a 5th wheel.

name: Freida Clark DeGrado
text: Excellent service dept

name: John Zink
text: Great 😂😂😂😂😂

name: Sandra Moeller
text: Excellent service

name: ray Thornton
text: Got mad because we didn't buy right away

name: Larry Tooley
text: Helpful

name: Sarona Kohler
text: Rvs  motor homes and shop.

name: David Yant
text: Horrible service and sales once they get there money they don't care.

name: Jeff Clark
text:
I had my camper picked up by an individual from Madison RV and he took it into the service department at Campers Inn on Jordan Lane to get it fixed and they did a great job. I had a small issue with the awning on the camper and I was going to have them check that out also but then I told them not to worry about it. To my surprise when the camper was delivered to the house I noticed that they went above and beyond and fixed the part the awning that was coming loose from the camper. Very happy with the service department. I could definitely say they did go the extra mile.
Donnie the service advisor is the one I communicated with over the phone.

name: Brian Coulter
text: I started researching travel trailers back in November 2018 prepping for my first purchase. I am one people that needs all the information I can get to make best choice I can, and I can tell you that I found many problematic dealers, models, etc. along the way. I finally came across a place, Camper Inn of Huntsville (2hrs from me), in a forum discussion. So, I gave them a call expecting the same problems, however, after speaking to Frank; I could not believe that we had a real honest conversation. After the initial call, I drove down to speak with Frank face to face, even more impressed. He answered all the detailed questions about the model I was looking at and gave real honest answers. I was sold not just on the competitive pricing, but on the authenticate relationship between buyer and seller. We bought our first travel trailer in March 2019 with peace of mind my family are in good hands at Campers Inn. The service team is outstanding as well! To sum up, if you want a worry-free transaction knowing that you will be taking care of NOT taken advantage of, then please call Frank and his team.

name: sheila larson
text: My favorite part was the fact that there were no salespeople following us around.  They had a nice variety of campers, leisurely shopping, and help knowledgeable available when we asked for it.  They have a great selection of Winnebago campers.

name: John Manfred
text: Excellent service department, Myles is the man! Thank you so much for helping us get back on the road.

name: Britt Clark
text: Friendly and helpful. More focused on the customer than the sale.

name: Mike Fellows
text: Great service. Very welcoming. Appreciate the service.

name: Shelby Brooke
text: Me and my Fiancé can’t say enough good things about this place! We had tried 3 other places trying to get a loan or financing, got shot down every time because of our age (23) and not having years upon years of credit history. Other places assumed we were young so we couldn’t afford or be responsible enough for a newer camper. It was very disappointing to us and we almost gave it up. But we decided to give this place a try, and we are so glad we did! We were immediately greeted and helped by Jolie. We were treated with respect, and everyone was so helpful and friendly. Chris showed us everything about our fifth wheel from top to bottom, inside and out of how it all works. They were also kind enough to deliver it, as we weren’t set up to haul it completely yet. We will continue to do business here in the future! We love our fifth wheel, it’s perfect! Thank you southern rv for a wonderful experience.

name: Patrick Nesbit
text: I must say that I am really impressed with the job that Southern RV Wholesale on Jordan Lane in Huntsville, AL does in sales and service.  Drew and his staff go out of their way to make sure that your RV Sales and Service experience is a good one!  Drew and his staff are always friendly and helpful.  If you are looking for an RV, check them out....you won't be sorry!

name: Joe Wassell
text:
A terrible experience trying to get service on our Keystone RV. Although they claim to be a certified repair center for Keystone products, they were never able to complete the appropriate warranty information and submit it to the manufacturer. The service representative initially blamed the manufacturer for rejecting the claims, but the truth prevailed and proved otherwise.  Then the warranty representative would not approve the wording of the remaining  claims for submission to the manufacturer.
This establishment has no respect for the customer and are not honest when they answer questions from the customer. Unfortunately, we had to contact Keystone directly to closeout our work order since the service representative couldn't get it done.
I would not recommend this repair center to anyone who expects honesty, integrity & customer satisfaction.

name: Brent Brinson
text: Everyone is just so nice and honest.  I have had only great service.

name: Kathy Gonzalez
text: Great place! Staff was extremely nice and very helpful.

name: Carter Eide
text: Safety recall required inspection, I called ahead. They had us in and out in 15 minutes. Great staff, friendly efficient service.

name: Betty Samuelson
text: We just purchased a travel trailer and the service was wonderful.  Staff was very attentative.  I took up much of their time for 3 days - and the staff worked as a team.  The manager had ideas that we didn't consider.  We have been getting our servicing done there on our trade in - which we have not been dissappointed there either.

name: Mary Breeden
text: Great customer service. Wide selection of rv. Gregg is extremely knowledgeable and customer oriented.

name: Diane Lyles
text: We were considering purchasing a Winnebago Mini Drop until the sales person approached us while looking at one. She was very condescending and was trying to talk us out of the features we wanted and into features we didn’t want. We had done comparisons of trailer styles before we went to purchase, so we knew what we were looking for.  The experience was so awful we were convinced to take our business elsewhere.

name: Rick J
text: They're always helpful and patient.

name: Evelyn Zuhse
text: Great experience, GREAT customer service.

name: William Ramirez
text: Great camper and repair facility.

name: Alicia Newberry
text: Fantastic price on this toy hauler!

name: jason Miller
text: Great people and service!

name: Sheila
text: Helpful and friendly staff

name: mike clinard
text: Most helpful

name: Gary Hess
text: Great people to work with

name: mark roller
text: Nice people to deal with

name: Thelma Jackson
text: NEVER BEEN THERE!

name: Wayne Anders
text: They were there the day they said they would be there and on time. Friendly and professional. They were able to get my roof too AC working.

name: Brenda Noland
text:
FINALLY Simply the Best and Definitely Better than all the Rest in Baldwin County. I am one Happy Camper that I found  a knowledge, reliable and affordable RV Tech Company. The
Dream Team Has Arrive to Our Area!
👏👏👏👏😊

name: Michael Ravenelle
text: Excellent experience. I had clogged drains on my AC and called to request a service. Josh and his staff arrived the same day. They serviced both of our AC units and I also inquired about the worn caulking on my roof. Josh and his Staff did an amazing job. They were very professional and completed everything in a timely manner. Highly recommend!!!!!!

name: Brian Moyer
text: Josh is the absolute best! He repaired and tested several things on our camper. The battery had been removed by the previous owner, and he recommended installing a new one. I purchased a battery and installed it. I had no idea that black is hot and white is ground. : /   Josh was back out at my house within hours to replace all the fuses I blew. Thank you very much for helping us! I will not wire anything else without calling Mr RV Tech first. 😂

name: ANNA GAILLIARD
text:
Josh, the owner is honest, knowledgeable, and very good at his profession. He came thru with his brother and they were both professional and had solid work ethics .
. "Job well done", Josh. I recommend them to anyone needing those services.

name: unfair unbalanced
text: Jamie did a great job on vent replacement and resealing very professional

name: Bonnie Brock
text: We have a 2019 Montana High Country. We have battled a roof leak around the rear AC due to a factory defect. General RV and Camping World could not seem to fix  it. We called this company, they came the same day, he spent about 3 hours on the roof and no more leaks! He was very professional and knew what he was doing. I highly recommend this mobile service!Thank you!

name: Matt Pickart
text: Excellent Service.  James came on-site and resolved our issue quickly and provided an excellent customer service experience!

name: Amanda Bedsaul
text: #1 RVIA Certified Tech in Lower AL!!
